name: Of Void
description:
Manipulate space and gravity to navigate through the depth of the void to reach the bottom of everything and uncover its secrets. 

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Space: Jump

E: Interact

R: Restart Level

Credits:

Music: Sergey Cheremisinov

Sfx:  freesound.org

* A game made for Ludum Dare 48 *
